title: Does dodging decrease LP gain?
body:
You know how you gain less LP after you've played 100 games than when you've just started ranked?
Does dodging count as a game played and make you gain less and less LP per win?
Or is this not affected by dodging?

replies.body: Dodging does not effect your MMR, this means it will not effect your default LP gain. However, if you dodge several times in one day the amount of LP you loss increases from 3, 5, 10, ..
